column1: 2/ Per capita personal income is total personal income divided by total midyear population. BEA state per capita personal income statistics are calculated using Census Bureau midyear population estimates. These annual midyear estimates are based on the 2010 census. BEA will incorporate Census Bureau midyear population estimates based on the 2020 census results when they become available.
* Estimates prior to 1950 are not available for Alaska and Hawaii.
Note. All dollar estimates are in millions of current dollars (not adjusted for inflation). Calculations are performed on unrounded data.
Last updated: September 23, 2021-- revised statistics for 1998-2020.
